name: Laser the Space Narwhale
description:
Controls: WASD and ARROW keys to move, fly up past the screen to screen wrap to the bottom (useful for anyone trying to get a score of 500) and vise versa. SPACE or LMB to shoot. Should work with controllers.

You are a narwhale named Laser flying through space. you must protect earth from the invading forces of evil aliens.

I might continue production of this game after the jam to introduce things like powerups, more enemies, and stages. THE BOSS CANT DIE IN THIS VERSON, I ran out of time to properly implement the boss death system so I made the boss allow the player to score a bunch of points by hitting its weak spot.

I know that narwhals are not fish. They are actually mammals, however they still live in water, so thus I classify them as fish.
